summary: the water might be lovely chapter 16 word count: 5K (78K so far) rated: E  summary: Dan, utterly fed up with uni, runs away to...
body:
the water might be lovely

chapter 16

word count: 5K (78K so far)

rated: E

summary:

Dan, utterly fed up with uni, runs away to the Isle of Man.

Seeking escape, he gets more than he bargained for when he rents a room out from happy-go-lucky, recent grad, Phil Lester.

excerpt:

“And when I’m kissing you…” Phil says, interrupting Dan’s rogue train of thought. “…if I wanted to tell you how pretty you are, could I? Or would you be too shy?”

Dan swallows. “Well… maybe I might allow it then.”

“Ok…” Phil bites his lip to suppress a grin, tilting his head in consideration. His eyes inquisitively roam a spot on Dan’s jaw. “And then… if I wanted to kiss down your neck, could I?”

[read on ao3]

[read from beginning]

reblog.comment:

rating: m

summary: How many times has dan fallen off his chair and not been wearing pants so it hasn’t been Added in to the video... that’s what I...
question: How many times has dan fallen off his chair and not been wearing pants so it hasn’t been Added in to the video... that’s what I want to know.
answer: anon out here asking the real questions (for context - x) but uhhh i’m willing to bet exactly once, and then phil (after he finally stopped laughing his ass off) demanded that dan has to wear pants for all future horror games so if he falls again they can keep it in ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

reblog.comment: anon out here asking the real questions (for context - x) but uhhh i’m willing to bet exactly once, and then phil (after he finally stopped laughing his ass off) demanded that dan has to wear pants for all future horror games so if he falls again they can keep it in ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

title: undisclosed desires
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2BamnNf

by outphan

Daniel Howell is UK’s most popular musician. He loves his music, the world he’s a part of. But Dan Howell doesn’t. Then the director of his new music video quits and soon a storm begins that cannot be stopped.

summary: Daniel Howell is UK’s most popular musician. He loves his music, the world he’s a part of. But Dan Howell doesn’t. Then the director of his new music video quits and soon a storm begins that cannot be stopped.

written for @phandombigbang 2018!
beta by @yourfriendlyblogstalker and art by @illodie coming soon. thank you to you both, I’m grateful for your help!
shout out to @amethysthollis for listening to me and my bs <3 (also big thank you the word war chat people!!)

tw for homophobia and use of homophobic language!

Mobile Links
